source.name: Question1
source.instructions:
A student has created an array to store their computer science marks.
```
computerScience[6, 8, 9, 3, 5, 7, 10, 2, 4]
```
source.text:
**What numbers are returned from the following commands.**
```computerScience.length``` = <<<9>>>
```print(computerScience[3])``` = <<<3>>>
```print(computerScience[2] * computerScience[6])``` = <<<90>>>

**Write down the command that would return the number 9** = <<<print(computerScience[2])>>>

text:

source.name: Question2
source.instructions:
A student has stored all of his computer science marks in an array called ‘computerScienceMarks’  and has written some code to store them in a text file.
The routine consisted of 5 lines of code.
In the following table select the correct commands for each of the line numbers.
source.text:
|**Line number** |**Commands**| 
| :------ | :----------- |
|1| <<<marksFile = openWrite(“marksFile”)>>>|
|2|<<<for index = 0 to computerScieneMarks.length – 1>>>|
|3|<<<marksFile.writeLine(computerScienceMarks[index])>>>|
|4|<<<next index>>>|
|5|<<<friendsFile.close()>>>|
